name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

backendProject.description: Optional name of the backend project to use. If provided, creates a stateful module (application) that uses the backend.config from the specified backend project. If not provided, creates a simple module (library).
backendProject.x-prompt: (Optional) Name of the backend project to use? Leave blank for a simple module

backendType.description: Type of Terraform backend (aws-s3 or local). Required for API consistency, even for simple modules (where it's not used). Used for backend configuration when backendProject is provided.
